channel.title: Travel and Tourism on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in Travel and Tourism on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: Snemanje Robina Hooda - malce bližje
item.description: [caption id=“attachment_1329” align=“aligncenter” width=“446”] Slika z BBC strani, avtorja Scotty[/caption] Včeraj sem šel spet malo na ogled do lokacije snemanja novega filma o Robinu Hoodu na obali Freshwater West in zadeve so se precej spremenile od prejšnjega tedna, ko sem bil nazadnje tam. Varnostnikov ni bilo veliko in tokrat so me vsaj spustili na plažo, kljub temu, da je na tam potekalo snemanje. Povsod sami statisti, večinoma v horizontali.

item.title: Trekking the hills of Snowdon
item.description: Ever since I moved to Wales 2 years ago I had a quiet wish to climb the highest peak in this country - Snowdon. Last weekend was showing to be a perfect opportunity to fulfil that wish. I was working only till 12 pm and the forecast was for sunshine and high temperatures stretching way into the following week. Getting some good literature , so you know what your are doing, is very advisable.
